explanation: [0-0] The video starts with a young man in a green hoodie, white pants, white shoes, and white socks squatting on a gravel road, looking ahead. A young woman with blonde hair, wearing a blue jacket and black shoes, stands behind him, looking down at her phone with a black shoulder bag. In the distance, there is a fence, a green lawn, some trees, and the Eiffel Tower. The sky is blue with some fluffy clouds. There is a white number 3 in the center of the screen.

[0-4] Subsequently, a countdown begins. The man turns around and walks towards the woman, squatting down in front of her. He places his left hand on his left knee and lets his right hand hang naturally as he looks up at the woman. The white subtitle "mache einen auf Antrag" appears at the bottom of the screen. The woman looks up at the man slightly.

[4-7] The camera zooms in, showing only the upper half of the woman's body. The white subtitle "OMG" appears at the top of the screen. Immediately, the camera returns to the original position. The man remains half-squatting, lowers his head, and puts his right hand into the right pocket of his white pants, with his left hand in front of his right pocket. The white subtitle "Oh..." appears at the bottom of the screen. Then, the camera zooms in as the man looks up at the woman and quickly lowers his head to tie his left shoelace. The white subtitle "Schuh ist offen" appears at the bottom of the screen.

[7-9] The screen switches back to the previous position. The woman extends her right index finger and places it on the man's head. The white subtitle "enttauscht" appears at the top of the screen. After tapping twice, she lowers her hand. The man looks up at the woman, and they make eye contact. The man stands up, bends over slightly, smiles, and walks towards the front of the screen. The woman turns her head to the left and turns around, walking forward. The white subtitle "Sorry Chrissi!" appears at the bottom of the screen.
